comment.realname: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru  / The National Library of Wales
comment.author: 37199428@N06
comment._content: A oes heddwch? Is there peace? The National Eisteddfod of Wales continued throughout the war, though with some changes of venue. In June 1940 the Gorsedd held this ceremony at Colwyn Bay to announce the following year's Eisteddfod. But due to the risk of air attacks the eisteddfod itself was held at nearby Old Colwyn.
